title.rendered: fruit dessert recipes for the family

content.rendered:
Serving fruit dessert always brings the family together. making fruit dessert is very easy even kids can help in preparing them. Making fruit desserts is an interesting game to encourage kids to eat more fruit. By the way, it is fun to eat kids-made desserts so let them help in the kitchen.
These fruit dessert recipes are easy and preparing them can boost your self-confidence so you can try out other recipes in your kitchen.

1)No-cook, no-bake fruit dessert recipe

Some fruit dessert recipes don’t need to be heated So that vitamins like vitamin C which is sensitive to heat, are preserved and thus you could receive a more nutritious snack.

  • One can of fruit cocktail; Strained and rinsed
  • 250 or 300 ml whipped or fresh cream
  • ½ cup of condensed milk
  • 2 tablespoons of honey
  • Fresh fruits like apple or peach; chopped
  • Nuts like cashew, almond, dried fruit (optional)

Beat the cream until it doubles in volume, then add the condensed milk and honey. All ingredients must be thoroughly mixed. Add fresh fruit like apple or peach and strain cocktail to the mix. Once they are thoroughly mixed, refrigerate them. Decorate the dessert with the nuts.

2) Neither sugar nor ice-cream

I am a fan of fruit dessert recipes that have no sugar. Sugar is not what our body needs.  It would be very beneficial for our bodies if we avoid consuming sugar every once in a while

  • Half a cup of cream
  • One cup of yogurt
  • One teaspoon of vanilla extract
  • Fresh fruits; chopped (strawberry, orange, banana, apple, pomegranate, or whatever you want)
  • One teaspoon of Honey

Beat the cream for 2 minutes until you get smooth and soft cream then add yogurt. Add vanilla extract. Mix them. Now we have cram and yogurt mixture. Leave it aside.

Put a layer of (about two teaspoons for each fruit) fresh fruit like pomegranate and mango in a dessert glass or a tall cup.

Then add 3 teaspoons of cream- yogurt. Put one teaspoon of honey and again add a layer of fruit like orange, apple, or mango and pour the rest of the cream- yogurt on the whole mixture. You can decorate the top with dried fruit. Now, you have a beautiful multi-layered healthy dessert.

3) Easy and delicious fruit dessert

This one is made with the help of home ingredients.

  • two spoons of powdered sugar or confectionary sugar
  • 500ml of whipped cream
  • two spoons of vanilla extract
  • ½ cup of your favorite fruit; chopped (like black and green grapes, apple, mango, strawberry)

Add powder sugar and vanilla extract to the whipped cream, whisk it until it is mixed thoroughly. If your cream becomes stiff, do not worry,  this recipe also works with stiff cream. The rest of the recipe is easy. One layer of fruit. then one layer of cream mixture. In the end, you can add some of your favorite sauces like chocolate. That’s it.  Below you can see a picture of the process.

4) tasty mango dessert

  • 2 cups of milk
  • ¼ cup milk; cold milk
  • 3 teaspoons of custard powered
  • ¼ cup of sugar  
  • ¾ cup of mango; blended
  • Fresh fruit (grapes, apple, pomegranate); two or three teaspoons  of each, chopped

    Bring two cups of milk to boil, in another bowl add custard powder to cold milk. Stir the cold milk bowl well and add it to the hot milk. add the sugar and keep stirring for 10 minutes. Now you have a creamy smooth mixture. Leave it to cool. Add mango, mix it until you get a consistent creamy-like mixture. Add the fresh fruit. Place it in the refrigerator for one hour.

5)  multi-layer

The bottom layer

The bottom ingredients:

  • ¼ cup of butter; melted
  • Two cups of cracker; grinded

Mix the butter and cracker in a bowl. cover a steel plate with wax paper and then pour the mixture on it afterward refrigerate it for one hour.

middle Layer  

Among multi-layer fruit dessert recipes, this one is the easiest.

Middle layer ingredients:

  • 300 ml orange juice
  • One cup of Sugar
  • One cup Cream cheese; chopped
  • Vanilla extract
  • Orange jam
  • 300ml whipped cream
  • 1/4 cup of gelatin

Add sugar, jam, and vanilla extract to the cream cheese, whisk them, then add the whipped cream, the orange juice, and the gelatin. Whip the entire ingredient completely and set it aside. Put it at the top of the bottom layer and put it in the refrigerator.  

The top layer  

Top layer ingredients:

  • 200 ml orange juice
  • ¼ cup of sugar
  • ¼ cup of orange jam and gelatin
  • One cup of chopped orange

In the third bowl mix the gelatin, juice, sugar, and chopped oranges. Put this mixture on top of other layers and chill them again. Finish it off by decorating with slices of orange.

6) raspberry sauce served by ice cream

  • One cup of raspberry, blended with half a cup of water, strained  
  • Two spoons of sugar
  • Hint of rosemary
  • Two or three spoons of ice cream
  • Lemon zest(optional)

Heat the blended and strained raspberry with sugar. Then add rosemary, after bubbling (not too much) Transfer it from the heated plate to a bowl and let it cool. Drizzle it on ice cream and enjoy it.

Now, it is your turn to use your imagination and add something to these fruit dessert recipes. Don’t hesitate to try something new.

excerpt.rendered: Desserts with fruit flavors are the best choice for a family-time afternoon. very easy and quick.
